column4: the tar.gz file you have is probably a source file.  And if you're running Ubuntu, that means you'll need to install a build environment first, and go through all the hassle of compiling gimp from source and installing.  BTW, that build environment is about 100mb.
alternately, you can just take the hit and download/install the gimp packages
it is easy.  It just requires an internet connection.
best of luck.  Better OS in less than 20mb... fun!
